titles.title: A bill to amend the Energy Policy and Conservation Act to increase the capacity of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6402)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
5/21/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Energy Policy and Conservation Act and the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to increase the capacity for storage of petroleum products in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve from 1 billion to 1.5 billion barrels.
